summary: Siegfried Fischbacher and Roy Horn, known as Siegfried & Roy, were German-American magicians who entertained people with their white lions and tigers. They started performing together on cruise ships and in Europe, then moved to Las Vegas in 1967. From 1990, they had a popular show at The Mirage. Their career ended in 2003 when a tiger seriously injured Horn during a live performance.
title: Siegfried & Roy
